Articles.Content: I'm new to the forum and I would like to use my ribbons, but I don't know how to add a signature to my posts. If someone could please instruct me in the ways of the signature, I would be grateful.

New users can't customise their avatar or signature, in case a spambot registers and either places links in their signature or uploads an inappropriate avatar. Within ~30 minutes of making your third or fourth post, these options will be available via the Settings link in the top right of the forum; the menu options for Avatar and Signature will be down the left side of the page

Do note, however, that if your signature is larger than 120px tall, it may be cut off by the forum's code and some of it will not be shown. This includes images like the ribbons as well as text.
Welcome aboard, oosime. Signature? got something to show?
